DataElement.preferredName: Neurology Survey of Autonomic Symptoms Assessment Score
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A branch of medicine concerned with the development, anatomy, function, and dysfunction of the nervous system._A questionnaire developed by Zilliox et al. in 2011 that consists of 11 items for women and 12 items for men, and utilizes a five-point rating scale to assess the severity of autonomic symptoms in patients with neuropathy._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A branch of medicine concerned with the development, anatomy, function, and dysfunction of the nervous system._A questionnaire developed by Zilliox et al. in 2011 that consists of 11 items for women and 12 items for men, and utilizes a five-point rating scale to assess the severity of autonomic symptoms in patients with neuropathy.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: the branch of medical science that deals with the study of structure, function, and diseases of the nervous system; for thorough searching also see NEUROSCIENCE, MENTAL DISORDER, NERVOUS SYSTEM DISORDER, NERVOUS SYSTEM DISORDER DIAGNOSIS, MENTAL DISORDER DIAGNOSIS, NERVOUS SYSTEM DISORDER CHEMOTHERAPY, COMMUNICATION DISORDER, NEUROMUSCULAR DISORDER.

Concepts.definition: A branch of medicine concerned with the development, anatomy, function, and dysfunction of the nervous system.

Property.preferredDefinition: A questionnaire developed by Zilliox et al. in 2011 that consists of 11 items for women and 12 items for men, and utilizes a five-point rating scale to assess the severity of autonomic symptoms in patients with neuropathy.

Concepts.definition: A questionnaire developed by Zilliox et al. in 2011 that consists of 11 items for women and 12 items for men, and utilizes a five-point rating scale to assess the severity of autonomic symptoms in patients with neuropathy.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.
